column4: Jamil_1  Problem is I need to Mount the DVD so that it shows hidden files, sudo mount -t udf -o ro,unhide /dev/cdrom /media/cdrom0   . In ubuntu 9.10 64 Bit it worked fine, im using 10.04 64 Bit and it doesnt work.
Jamil_1 I put the dvd in first and it mounts fine, but once i unmount it  ,    Sudo Umount /media/cdrom it unmounts fine, but trying to mount it is the problem now.
is there, like, an error message?
given that you know the identical command worked in 9.10 (you did say that, right?) then I'd say you've hit a bug. Have you looked in launchpad?
